name: jaunt
description: Get or set a value in an object/array using a dot-delimited string or array of keys.
author: Lim Yuan Qing

scripts.test: rm -rf coverage && node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover tape test/*.js
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && node_modules/.bin/browserify index.js --debug --outfile dist/jaunt.js --standalone jaunt && node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs dist/jaunt.js --output dist/jaunt.min.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm test && npm run dist
